column5: My mate Kris and I headed out Sunday morning for a couple of hours, it was bloody chilly out on the big lake! We hit a couple of bays and fished them hard, mainly just to stay warm lol! Husky Jerks produced the only fish we boated, we lost 3 or 4 others boatside and had a couple of nice follows. The two fish below were all we could manage for photo ops. A slow twitch pause retrieve turned a few followers into biters. Water temps have dropped ddrastically with these frost mornings we've been having, the warmest water we found was 47F... brrr!      Cheers, Shaun
Nice gators !! I love catching pike.They are such MANLY fish.
ha! I was literally just talking to Kinger about his trip out with you. He was just showing me the pics. Beauty fish...
Man, I always wanted to get my harbour license but was just too lazy! Some really good pike fishing right DT Toronto. Thanks for sharing.
Very nice! Pike are always fun to catch - and tasty too!
nice looking pike Shaun.  Thanks for the report.
Nice look'n Pike, we've tried for them a couple times this fall in Lake Huron with no success, but we'll keep trying maybe Richard

The best bit of advice I can give you is fish slow, really sloww twitch pause retrieve, and downsizing baits can help, all the fish we have had over the past few weeks have hit the HJ12 size Husky Jerks  Cheers, Shaun
Thanx Shaun we'll give them a try Richard
Looks like them gators were starting putting on the fall feed bag Great job Shaun and Co. Thanks for sharing Leechman
Your buddy Kris looks very familiar Shaun...good to see he is still wearing blue/white.  Cheers  Craig
